description: A basic wooden arrow, it has a arrow shaped obsidian tip with fletching.  It's a little hevier, does bit more damage than standard wood arrow, and has aceptable accuracy.  Stands a average chance of remaining intact once fired.

A heavy wooden arrow, it has a sharp obsidian tip with fletching.  It's much heavier than most wooden arrows, and as such, it does more damage thanks to its obsidian tip and flies straighter, adding better accuracy over significant range.  Stands a great chance of remaining intact once fired.
